results.text: «ትሠሩት በነበራችሁት ዋጋ የምትደሰቱ ኾናችሁ ብሉ፣ ጠጡም፤» (ይባላሉ)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እኛ እንደዚሁ መልካም ሠሪዎችን ሁሉ እንመነዳለን፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ብሉ፤ ጥቂትንም (ጊዜ) ተጠቀሙ፡፡ እናንተ አመጸኞች ናችሁና፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
